hint.text: The height of the bars show the number of goals scored by Zlatan in each season.

solution.text:
Observe the histogram carefully.
The bar for the \(2012-13\) season is the shortest.
Draw a horizontal line from the top of the bar to the y-axis.
Thus, the least number of goals scored in a single season is _{n}_.

content.text:
What was his lowest goal tally in a single season?
\(a=_{j}_, b=_{k}_, c=_{l}_, d=_{m}_, e=_{n}_, f=_{j}_, \)
